title: Flight Simulator 2020 - Addon spotlight - ORBX - Landmarks London City Pack Updated
description:
In this video we will at the updated Landmarks London City Pack from ORBX which has been released last week in the marketplace for MSFS 2020. The update contains the following new scenery items:

- HMS Belfast
- 8 Bishopsgate (under construction)
- Piccadilly Circus Billboard
- Emirates Air Line cable car
- Valiant Tower (under construction)
- New Apple campus at Battersea Power Station
- Pinnacle Apartments
-One Thames City (3 towers, under construction)
- Trafalgar Square & National Gallery
- Cutty Sark clipper

If you also want to use the enhanced London city pack visit the site from ORBX and consider buying it:
https://orbxdirect.com/product/landmarks-london
